title: Shoe washing machine bag neaker Cleaning shoe dryer Laundry shoe bag ，Reusable,Shoe washing bag for washing machine and dryer (Yellow 2PCS)
features: 【EASY TO CLEAN SHOES】- This Shoe Wash Bag eliminates the need for manual scrubbing, simply place your shoes in the bag and throw them in the washing machine to clean them easily.

【360° Protection & Cleaning】- Crafted from tear-resistant chenille fabric, this 16.5 x 7-inch bag safeguards your shoes from damage during the wash cycle. The breathable material ensures a thorough, all-around cleaning, protecting your shoes from wear and scratches.

【Microfiber Cleaning Power】- Equipped with over 10,000 2.5-cm-long chenille microfibers, the bag gently yet effectively cleans every nook and cranny of your shoes. These fibers work to remove dirt and stains without causing any harm to the shoe's surface.

【Rustproof Durable Zippers】 Built to last, the shoe laundry bag features Durability zippers that resist rust and stay securely closed throughout the washing process. This design prevents accidental openings and ensures your shoes stay safely inside the bag.

【MULTIFUNCTIONAL USE】- This reusable shoe washing bag is suitable for both the washing machine and the laundry room, it is the best solution to keep your shoes clean without compromising their condition. It is suitable for all kinds of footwear and is a must-have accessory for maintaining a clean and tidy lifestyle.
description: Product Description EASY TO CLEAN SHOES This Shoe Wash Bag eliminates the need for manual scrubbing, simply place your shoes in the bag and throw them in the washing machine to clean them easily. Microfiber Cleaning Power Protect your favourite footwear while achieving a thorough clean! Our premium shoe washing machine bag features 25,000+ ultra-soft chenille microfibers that wrap around shoes, lifting dirt and stains gently without abrasion. The dense, lint-free fibres ensure no residue is left on white sneakers or delicate fabrics, delivering a spotless finish every time.
